text: Air Tahiti Nui is a French airline, based in the French Polynesia. Air Tahiti Nui Seat Maps | SeatMaestro It was formed in 1996. The first flight was from Papeete to Los Angeles on November 20, 1998. Air Tahiti Nui Archives - AirlineReporter : AirlineReporter Later on, it started going to Tokyo, Osaka, Auckland, Paris and Sydney. As of 2016, Air Tahiti Nui goes to only 4 destinations from its hub at Fa'a'ā International Airport. The airline has a fleet of 5 Airbus A340 airplanes.
